result.title: Old Usaco Editorials
result.content: I remember back in 2004-2005 Usaco had blue-orange-green sections and the green division problems were quite rich of flow poblems. Also they had nice Editorials as usual. In CF I saw couple of threads asking for old Usaco problems and people were referring to many other sites. I was wondering if you have link/archive of those old Editorials.
